title: Implement Backup and Disaster Recovery for Observability
description: Implement Backup and Disaster Recovery for Observability.

effort_estimate.justification: Backup and disaster recovery are essential for ensuring that the observability stack is available even in the event of a disaster.

user_stories: As a system administrator, I want to ensure that the observability stack is available even in the event of a disaster.
business_rules: High availability setup must be implemented.

blocking_information.can_start_date: After INF-005-A, INF-005-B, INF-005-C, and INF-005-D are completed

additional_context.technical_notes: Ensure backup and disaster recovery are properly implemented.
additional_context.security_considerations: Secure the backup and disaster recovery system to prevent unauthorized access.
